segments.text: Hello . floor service , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , this is Smith from 1308 , can you add something to my room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , what would you need , Mr . Smith ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 2 towels and l Turkish towel , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will send them to you soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No more , thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
